    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:01.859
    | text      = Oh boy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:03.340
    | text      = Not great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:04.420
    | text      = It turns out that when you're the long dead King of England, money ain't an issue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:07.500
    | text      = That is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:08.500
    | text      = You just got buckets full of cash.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:10.140
    | text      = I don't understand how that would not make money an issue still.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:13.460
    | text      = No, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:14.460
    | text      = You got estates.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:15.460
    | text      = You got estates that you own.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:17.260
    | text      = Right, but you're long dead.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:18.260
    | text      = No, but you still own it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:19.260
    | text      = Oh, okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:20.260
    | text      = I didn't know that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:21.260
    | text      = You can just send a letter?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:23.260
    | text      = Here's where things get interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:25.380
    | text      = Because Richard Lawrence believed he was Richard III, he also believed that he owned multiple
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:28.979
    | text      = estates in England.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:29.979
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:30.979
    | text      = For reasons that aren't entirely clear, he also came to believe that Andrew Jackson's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:33.739
    | text      = vetoing of the Second Bank of the United States made it impossible for him to collect monies
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:38.100
    | text      = he was owed on the estates.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:40.060
    | text      = He reasoned that if he killed Jackson, Martin Van Buren would become president, he'd set
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:44.020
    | text      = up a central bank, and just like that, he gets all of his English estate money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:48.060
    | text      = Boom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:49.060
    | text      = So that's the reasoning that he used, and that's what Alex is going off of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:51.659
    | text      = I am fine with that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:52.659
    | text      = Pretending that he's an agent of the central banks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:55.659
    | text      = At this point, Richard started dressing up like British royalty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:58.819
    | text      = At times, he would fall into severe laughing or cursing fits, and the trend of him verbally
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:02.859
    | text      = and physically assaulting his sisters began to appear, which is always there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:06.859
    | text      = Always there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:07.859
    | text      = The assassination attempt itself is a story that people are much more familiar with.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:11.899
    | text      = Richard approached Jackson at the U.S. Capitol, he pulled out his pistol, it didn't fire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:15.579
    | text      = Pulled out his backup pistol, it also didn't fire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:18.739
    | text      = As he didn't have a third pistol, this gave way to Andrew Jackson beating Richard III
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:22.539
    | text      = with his cane.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:23.939
    | text      = Richard was then tackled by the crowd, which included Davy Crockett.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:28.060
    | text      = That's right, it did include Davy Crockett, holy shit, I always forget about that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:31.699
    | text      = Man of the wild frontier.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:32.699
    | text      = I always forget that Davy Crockett was somehow there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:35.300
    | text      = Yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:36.300
    | text      = He would go on to face trial.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:37.300
    | text      = Davy Crockett was like the Forrest Gump of that era.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:39.579
    | text      = Yeah, he was everywhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:40.579
    | text      = He's just fucking everywhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:41.579
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:42.579
    | text      = He would go on to face trial, where the prosecuting attorney was none other than Francis Scott
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:46.260
    | text      = Key, who mere years earlier had written The Star-Spangled Banner.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:50.180
    | text      = Richard was found innocent by virtue of insanity, and locked up in an asylum until his death
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:54.220
    | text      = 26 years later.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:55.899
    | text      = In the aftermath of the assassination attempt, with people trying desperately to find a reason
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:59.699
    | text      = for it, rumors spread that he was working for the proponents of the Second Bank of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:03.260
    | text      = United States, a theory that literally had no proof, no backing and evidence at all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:08.939
    | text      = In a move that would be mirrored by at least one president I can think of, Andrew Jackson
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:13.100
    | text      = encouraged these conspiracy theories, as it helped make him look heroic, and demonized
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:17.539
    | text      = his enemies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:18.539
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:19.539
    | text      = So, it was a crazy dude, not an agent of the bank.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:22.140
    | text      = And you're actually talking about Andrew Jackson?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:24.500
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:25.500
    | text      = He's a crazy dude.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:26.859
    | text      = Oh yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:27.859
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:28.859
    | text      = Anyway.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:29.859
    | text      = That fucking guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:30.859
    | text      = I'm sorry to tell you a story that you already know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:32.500
    | text      = I feel like...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:33.500
    | text      = No, that's my favorite story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:34.500
    | text      = It's a great story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:35.500
    | text      = I could hear that story a million times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:36.500
    | text      = I felt like, you know what it is?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:38.619
    | text      = On this show, your reactions are so sincere and in the moment, that you weren't surprised
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:44.140
    | text      = by any of that information.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:45.140
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:46.140
    | text      = And it disappointed me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:47.140
    | text      = I mean, it's a bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:49.220
    | text      = Because you weren't responding to new information or novelty, so you weren't as delighted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:53.460
    | text      = Do you know what frustrates me?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:56.300
    | text      = I think it was at least a couple of years ago, a friend of the show, Matt Drufke, sent
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:01.140
    | text      = me this video of somebody who had done, essentially, my Andrew Jackson bit on his album.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:09.340
    | text      = Oh no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:10.340
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:11.579
    | text      = That's terrible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:12.579
    | text      = We hadn't met.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:13.699
    | text      = I think it was...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:14.699
    | text      = I don't think he stole it from me or anything like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:17.180
    | text      = But he does...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:19.420
    | text      = The final line he does is line for line what I say, which is that, for once, the Secret
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:25.420
    | text      = Service didn't keep the president from being assassinated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:28.500
    | text      = They kept the president from assassinating a man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:31.739
    | text      = And I was so mad, because that was a good line, and that dude stole.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:35.220
    | text      = And he put it on an album.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:36.220
    | text      = He didn't steal it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:37.220
    | text      = But he's got it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:38.220
    | text      = He beat you to it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:39.220
    | text      = Yeah, he put it on an album.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:40.220
    | text      = I can't even say that line anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:42.060
    | text      = It's frustrating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:43.060
    | text      = Need a new X.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:44.060
    | text      = It's bullshit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:45.060
    | text      = So is the rest of this documentary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:46.060
    | text      = I am going to get a puppet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:48.060
    | text      = Ooh, I like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:49.060
    | text      = That's my plan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:50.060
    | text      = Ooh, Gerald Cilenti puppet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:51.699
    | text      = Oh yeah!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:52.699
    | text      = And it was something that Abraham Lincoln wore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:55.220
    | text      = Music is going to be played by Mikes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:57.260
    | text      = That's why I believe he was assassinated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:59.420
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:00.420
    | text      = This is the Lincoln quote.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:02.699
    | text      = The money powers prey upon the nation in times of peace.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:06.100
    | text      = Abraham Lincoln.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:07.100
    | text      = It is more despotic than monarchy, more insolent than autocracy, more selfish than bureaucracy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:20.460
    | text      = I see in the near future a crisis approaching that unnerves me and causes me to tremble
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:26.939
    | text      = for the safety of my country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:30.300
    | text      = Corporations have been enthroned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:33.300
    | text      = An era of corruption will follow and the money power of the country will endeavor to prolong
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:39.520
    | text      = its reign.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:40.520
    | text      = Picture a Tim Geithner who can also go fuck himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:42.899
    | text      = And Greenspan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:43.899
    | text      = And Greenspan who can also go fuck himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:46.619
    | text      = In a few hands and the republic is destroyed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:51.659
    | text      = Wall Street has killed Main Street.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:54.939
    | text      = So that's...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:55.939
    | text      = Definitely didn't have anything to do with slavery, Cilenti!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:38:59.659
    | text      = Well, that's Cilenti's argument for why Abraham Lincoln was assassinated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:04.420
    | text      = Yeah, definitely didn't have anything to do with...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:06.140
    | text      = That quote...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:07.140
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:08.140
    | text      = Led to his assassination.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:09.140
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:10.140
    | text      = That's a fake quote!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:11.140
    | text      = No shit!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:12.140
    | text      = Yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:13.140
    | text      = God dammit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:14.140
    | text      = It's a totally fake quote.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:15.140
    | text      = Fuck you, Cilenti.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:16.140
    | text      = Abraham Lincoln's collected works and writings, you can't find that quote because it's fake.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:19.979
    | text      = It didn't appear until 20 years after Lincoln's death during the 1896 presidential election.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:25.659
    | text      = So why did someone release a bogus letter about nefarious forces trying to meddle in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:29.460
    | text      = the economy during the 1896 election?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:32.140
    | text      = It's hard to say for sure, but one pretty strong guess is that the gold standard was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:36.199
    | text      = one of the top issues in that election and William Jennings Bryan was running as a Democratic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:40.659
    | text      = nominee and had just delivered his cross of gold speech at the Democratic National Convention.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:45.699
    | text      = It makes sense that this would be an issue that would come back up in terms of...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:50.100
    | text      = And everybody likes to try and take historical heroes and pretend they said things that were
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:54.939
    | text      = predicted or supported their cause.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:58.460
    | text      = Or historical villains.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:39:59.859
    | text      = Hitler said that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:02.279
    | text      = In the past, we've seen Alex Jones and his crew use completely fabricated quotes on a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:06.260
    | text      = regular basis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:07.460
    | text      = Almost everything in Endgame was fake quotes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:09.979
    | text      = Like it was nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:11.619
    | text      = That's definitely...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:12.619
    | text      = Not according to Encarta.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:14.020
    | text      = That's definitely in their repertoire, but in this case, they might have a slightly better
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:18.060
    | text      = argument than in past cases.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:20.260
    | text      = They just don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:21.260
    | text      = Well, yeah, because in 1950, Archer H. Shaw released the Lincoln Encyclopedia, which purported
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:26.699
    | text      = to be a one-stop shop for all things Lincoln.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:29.220
    | text      = The problem is that he didn't do his due diligence in terms of authenticating things he put in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:33.220
    | text      = the encyclopedia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:34.579
    | text      = He includes the letter that this quote comes from in that encyclopedia, a letter supposedly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:38.739
    | text      = to Colonel William F. Elkins, but historians and researchers have clearly determined that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:43.100
    | text      = that letter was a forgery.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:44.680
    | text      = It was far from the only example of the lack of completionism in his book, and thus, it's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:49.340
    | text      = not seen as a well-put-together resource for information.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:52.300
    | text      = But I could see Gerald Cilenti or Alex seeing that book called the Lincoln Encyclopedia
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:40:56.020
    | text      = and assuming everything in it was unquestionably true and not taking any further steps of research.
